alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, northern Evangeline, east central Beauregard, western Avoyelles and Allen Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 458 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lecompte to near Elizabeth to 7 miles west of Sugartown. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Marksville, Bunkie, Oberlin, Glenmora, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Dry Creek, Effie, Mittie, Grant, Cottonport, Pine Prairie, Mansura, Lecompte, Hessmer, Evergreen and Plaucheville. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 44 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
